meanings.definition: Beyond the boundaries of the Milky Way galaxy.
meanings.sent1: The telescope captured an extragalactic image of a distant galaxy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study extragalactic phenomena to understand the universe better.
meanings.sent3: The extragalactic aliens in the movie had advanced technology.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were as vast and extragalactic as the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The extragalactic view from the observatory was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Relating to or originating from outside of the galaxy.
meanings.sent1: The astronomers discovered an extragalactic source of cosmic rays.
meanings.sent2: The spacecraft detected an extragalactic signal from a neighboring galaxy.
meanings.sent3: The extragalactic visitor brought unique gifts from another galaxy.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts traveled through an extragalactic realm of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The extragalactic energy emitted by the star was mesmerizing.
